page.title: 18Farms in the area.
page.content: {The Maltings}is a large{chicken farm.} There is a shed with 4,485 chicks inside.They are a special sex called hi-sex brown.They rear chicks from one day old to eighteen weeks when they are sold.The chicks are fed on chickmash.From one day old to eight weeks old one chick would eat Â£15 worth of chickmash. {Rylands Farm}was originally two farms.Now it is one big one.Three men work on the farm.There is a big{barn } which held 550 tons of grain in the sixteenth century.It was hand made with double beams.There is also an old dove cot.The farm has one Land Rover and three tractors. {Yew Tree Farm}also has a big old{barn, with some lovely beams.Part of{Yew {Tree House}is 400 years old.It is not occupied any more.
